query:
SELECT v.id, v.formandoId, v.valorTotal, v.valorLiquido, v.excluido,
       DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') as data_venda,
       f.nome as formando_nome,
       f.turmaId
FROM vendas v 
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
WHERE DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2026-06-15'
ORDER BY v.id
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT v.id, v.formandoId, v.valorTotal, v.valorLiquido, v.excluido,
       DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') as data_venda,
       f.nome as formando_nome,
       f.turmaId
FROM vendas v 
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
WHERE DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2026-06-15'
ORDER BY v.id
